title: mri_copy_params
description: A tool to replace the volume parameters of an input volume with those of a template volume.

in_vol.title: Input Volume
in_vol.description: Input volume file whose parameters will be replaced.

template_vol.title: Template Volume
template_vol.description: Template volume file whose parameters will be copied.

out_vol.title: Output Volume
out_vol.description: Output volume file with replaced parameters.

size_flag.title: Copy Voxel Size Flag
size_flag.description: Force copying of voxel sizes when resolutions vary.
